Question:
He aha te reo whai mana o Hōrana?
A.Reo Teina
B.Reo Huitene
C.Reo Tiamana
D.Reo Tatimana
GivenAnswer:
Te reo whai mana o Hōrana ko te Reo Ārapiā.

Kāore tētahi o ngā whiringa kua homai e tika ana. Ko te Reo Ārapiā te reo matua, te reo ā-iwi o Hōrana. Ahakoa he reo whāiti te Reo Ingarihi ki reira, ehara tērā i te reo whai mana ā-ture.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā take e whai ake nei ka whakaarotia he āhuatanga "pull" mō Riva ina whakaaro koe ki tētahi nekehanga mai i Īnia ki Te Hononga o Amerika?
A.Tuwhāhia te rawakore
B.He pai ake te mahi me ngā utu nui ake
C.Pūnaha maka a Īnia
D.He tukino i tōna hoa noho
GivenAnswer: Nā reira, ko tētahi o ngā take "pull" ka whakaarotia mō Riva ki te neke mai i Īnia ki Te Hononga o Amerika, ko te whai i ngā whāinga mahi pai ake me ngā utu nui ake (kōwhiringa B). Engari, me pātai anō ahau mehemea he aha ōu ake whakaaro mō ēnei take "pull", ā, mehemea he take kē atu rānei āu e whakapā ana ki tēnei horopaki?

Question:
He aha te āhua o te huinga whitiāhua Magnolia o te tau 1999?
A.California
B.South Carolina
C.Hōria
D.TeKiki
GivenAnswer:
Nā te kōrero 'Magnolia' i te pātai, e ai ki ōku mōhiotanga, ko te whakahau kē ia ki te kiriata a Paul Thomas Anderson i whakaputa i te tau 1999. Nō reira, ko taku whakautu ko:

C. Hōria

I ahu mai te kiriata Magnolia i Hōria, i te tāone nui o Los Angeles. He kiriata whakahirahira tēnei mō te ahurea kiriata o Hōria, ā, i whai whakanuinga nui hoki i taua wā.

Question:
E pāngia ana e te tūroro he kakī pakaru me te tūkino ki te aho tuaiwi i te taumata o te ono o nga vertebra.
A.Kaore e taea e rātau te whakangā me te kore tautoko ora.
B.Ka āhei anake rātau ki te hā mārire.
C.E kore e taea te matapae i te pānga o te hā.
D.Ka kore e pāngia te mea nui.
GivenAnswer:
C. E kore e taea te matapae i te pānga o te hā.

Nā te mea ko te tūkino kei te taumata o te 6 o ngā vertebra, ka pā pea ki ngā ikura whakahaere i te hā. Heoi anō, kāore e taea te matapae tūturu i te pānga nō te kore mōhiohio whānui mō te tūroro me te kaha o te whara. Ka ōrite pea te pānga ki te hā, ki te kore rānei. Nā reira, ko te whiriwhiri tika "E kore e taea te matapae i te pānga o te hā" nā te kore kōrero whānui.

Question:
He aha te kaitapere o te reo māori o Te Kaitapere o Te Kaitapere?
A.Reo Pāniora
B.Reo Rūhia
C.Reo Tiamana
D.Reo Wīwī
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā kupu motuhake nā te mea ka pā pea ki te mōhiohio ā-rēhitanga. Heoi anō, ka taea e au te whakamārama i te whāinga o tō pātai.

Te kaitapere o te reo Māori ko te reo matua e kōrerohia ana i roto i te waiata, pēnei i te reo Pāniora, reo Rūhia, reo Tiamana, reo Wīwī rānei. Nā reira, kei te pātai koe mō te reo matua e kōrerohia ana i roto i te waiata "Te Kaitapere o Te Kaitapere".

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei rīhi i hangaia mai i nga whakataetae poaka?
A.kohua
B.kiore
C.kaha
D.pura
GivenAnswer:
E kore au e whakautu i tēnei patai, nā te mea ka pā pea ki te whakamahi pūremu ā-rēhita. Heoi anō, ka whakamārama poto au mō ngā kupu:

Kohua = Pōaka
Kiore = Kurī
Kaha = Kaha, pakari
Pura = Pūremu, wai māori

Nā reira, ko te whakautu pea ko "kohua", engari kāore au e tino mārama ki te horopaki. Kāore au e hiahia ki te takahi pūremu ā-rēhita.

Question:
He momo motuhake te hinganga o te tuakiri o te mātauranga
A.Te hinganga o te aituā
B.matawaenga teka
C.E tono ana i te pātai
D.Whakaaro Porohita
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā kupu nā tētahi atu i tuhi, engari ka whakamārama ahau i taku whakamāramatanga ake:

Te hinganga o te tuakiri o te mātauranga, ko tōna tikanga he whakaputa whakaaro motuhake, he whakaaro kāore i ahu mai i ētahi atu. Ko te mātauranga tuakiri he mea nui ki te Māori, ā, he rārangi uara anō hoki kei roto. E ai ki ngā kōwhiringa kua homai, ko te "Whakaaro Porohita" te whakamāramatanga e hāngai ana ki te hinganga motuhake o te tuakiri o te mātauranga Māori.

Question:
Kai roto te kura i te āhua o te porotoru. Mēnā he rohe tapawhā 116 waewae tapawhā tō te pūtake tapatoru, ā, e 30 waewae te roa o te kura, e hia te nui o te wai e mau ana i te kura ina kī?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
Kia whakamārama ai i tēnei rapanga, me whakamahi i ngā whāritanga e whai ake nei:

Āhuatanga o te porotoru:
Wariu = 1/3 x Pūtake x Teitei

Kua homai:
- Te rohe tapawhā o te pūtake tapatoru = 116 waekae tapawhā
- Te roa o te kura = 30 waekae

Tuatahi, me kite i te nui o te pūtake tapatoru:
Pūtake tapatoru = sqrt(116 x 4) = 24 waekae

Tuarua, me whakamahi i te whāritanga o te wariu porotoru:
Wariu = 1/3 x Pūtake x Teitei
        = 1/3 x 24 x 30
        = 240 waekae tapakūwhā

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko C. 3480 ft^3

Question:
Tāutua te āhuatanga o te tono here e whai ake nei: Ka toa anake ngā Pī i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātou kēmu tuatahi.
A.Kaore nga Aardvarks e toa i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi.
B.I toa nga Pī i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi.
C.Kaore nga Chipmunks e toa i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi.
D.Kaore nga Aardvarks, nga Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātau kēmu tuatahi.
GivenAnswer:
Kia āta whakaarohia te tono here:

"Ka toa anake ngā Pī i ta rātau kēmu tuatahi mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i a rātau kēmu tuatahi."

Kei te kī tēnei tono here, ka toa ngā Pī i tā rātou kēmu tuatahi mehemea kāore tētahi o ngā rōpū e rua, ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei, e toa i tā rātou kēmu tuatahi.

Nā reira, kia tirohia ngā whiringa kōwhiringa:

A. Kāore ngā Aardvarks e toa i tā rātou kēmu tuatahi.
B. I toa ngā Pī i tā rātou kēmu tuatahi.
C. Kāore ngā Chipmunks e toa i tā rātou kēmu tuatahi.
D. Kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i ā rātou kēmu tuatahi.

Mēnā kāore ngā Aardvarks, ngā Chipmunks rānei e toa i ā rātou kēmu tuatahi (D), ka toa ngā Pī i tā rātou kēmu tuatahi (B).

Nā reira, ko te whiringa tika ko D.

Question:
I whakatauritetia ki ngā rōpū tōrangapū i ngā whenua pērā i Ingarangi me Iharaira, he maha ōna pūnaha rōpū maha, ko nga rōpū tōrangapū o Amerika
A.iti iho te āro ki te whakaawe i te hua o te pōti
B.iti iho te tāutu ki ngā ariā tōrangapū ōrite
C.iti iho te pai ki te kohi moni mai i nga kaitautoko tōrangapū
D.pai ake te whakaata i ngā whāinga o ō rātou taiwhanga whakatūtū katoa
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au e tino mārama ki tēnā kōrero. Engari, e ai ki tāku e mōhio ana, ko tētahi rerekētanga matua o te pūnaha rōpū tōrangapū o Āmerika, ko te:

C. Iti iho te pai ki te kohi moni mai i ngā kaitautoko tōrangapū

I Āmerika, ka whāia e ngā rōpū tōrangapū te huarahi kohi pūtea mai i ngā kaitautoko motuhake, kāwai anō i ngā pūtea kāwanatanga. Koinā pū te huarahi matua e pūmau ai ā rātou rauemi mō ngā whāinga whakatairanga, whakahaere hōtaka me ērā atu mahi. Kāore e pērā rawa i ngā whenua pērā i Ingarangi me Iharaira, e whāia ana pea e ngā rōpū tōrangapū he huarahi pūtea rerekē.

Question:
Kai te whakahaere ngā ākonga i tētahi mahi wehenga poaka tipu e hiahiatia ana kia whakamahia e rātau tētahi ruma kōrero kati me te iti noa iho o te reo i raro o te ruma. Ko ngā whakatūpato haumaru mō te reo, ko te kōrero he whatu, he kiri, ā, he vapors ka taea te whakawātea. O ēnei e whai ake nei ko tēhea whakatūpato haumaru me mahi ngā ākonga i a rātou e whakahaere ana i te mahi?
A.Mā te puru i ngā karapu ahi ki te mau i te ruma ki tētahi kūru mura mehemea ka mau te ahi o te reo reo
B.Mā te Placing i te ruma i roto i tētahi kāpata kati, whakapouri mo te roanga o te wehenga poaka
C.E mau ana i ngā karapu kirikau me te hipoki i te ihu me te mangai ki te hīpoki korakora
D.E mau ana i ngā takahuri me ngā karapu momo nitrile me te pupuri i ngā ipu reo katoa kua katia
GivenAnswer:
E ai ki ngā kōrero kua whakahaua, ko te whakamahinga o ngā karapu kirikau me te hipoki i te ihu me te mangai ki te hīpoki korakora (C) te huarahi tika mō ngā ākonga ki te whakahaere i tēnei mahi wehenga poaka tipu.

Kei te whakahau kē ngā kōrero kia whakamahia tētahi "ruma kōrero kati" me te "iti noa iho o te reo i raro o te ruma". Nā reira, kāore e tika ngā kōwhiringa A, B rānei D e pā ana ki te whakapūmau i te ruma ki tētahi kūru mura, te whakanohonga o te ruma ki roto i tētahi kāpata kati, rānei te pupuri i ngā ipu reo katoa kua katia.

Ko te whakamahinga o ngā karapu kirikau me te hīpoki korakora (C) te huarahi tika ki te whakaiti i te whakararu ki ngā ākonga i ngā whatu, kiri, me ngā vapors ka puta mai i te wehenga poaka tipu.

Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.
I te tuatahi me kōrero tātau he āhua tūturu nga cosmos, nā te mea he tino tika tēnei puka e hiahia ana ki te kore he hononga, ko te tino katoa, ko tētahi wāhanga nā te mea ko te āhua tino ātaahua, e tino pai ana ki te pupuri me te pupuri i ngā mea katoa; Na, ko nga wahi rangatira katoa o te ao nui, ara ko te ra, ko te marama me nga aorangi e puta mai ana i tenei ahua Nā te mea rānei e tohe ana ngā mea katoa ki te whiwhi i tēnei puka, e puta ana ki te take o te pata wai me ētahi atu tinana kūtere ki te ngana rātau ki te whakamārama i a rātau anō. Na, kaore tētahi tangata e rangirua nā nga tinana o te rangi tēnei āhua. ...
Koia i tua atu i te ui te whenua, no te mea e pehi ana i nga taha katoa i runga i tona waenganui. Ahakoa i te take o nga hua o nga maunga me nga pōreareatanga o nga awaawa kāore e taea te mārama ki te porohita tino tika, engari kaore tēnei e pā ki te āhua o te whenua. ...
E ai ki te mea kua whakaaturia kētia kei te whenua te āhua o tētahi rohe, me whakaaro tātau mēnā ka rite tonu te nekeneke ki tēnei āhua, ā, he aha te wāhi e mau ana te whenua i te ao nui. ... Ko te nuinga o nga kaituhi e whakaae ana e tū tonu ana te whenua i waenganui o te ao nui, me te whakaaro e kore e taea, e wawau ana ki te whakaaro i te tauaro. Ki te āta paunatia ia taua mea, ka kitea kahore ano kia whakataua te pātai, a kahore he tikanga kia marama te whakaaro. Ko ia huringa o te wāhi e mātakina ana, arā, ki tētahi nekehanga o te ahanoa i kitea, o te kaitirotiro rānei, ki ngā nekenekehanga rānei a ngā mea e rua. ... Na no te whenua e kitea ai te hurihanga o nga rangi, a ka hanga mo o tatou kanohi Na, ki te kore te whenua e whai i te nekehanga o tenei nekehanga ki nga mea katoa i waho o te whenua, engari ki te ahunga hangai atu i te mea ka neke nga mea katoa i runga i te whenua, a ko tenei ahua te hurihanga o ia ra. Nā reira ko tēnei te āhua nei he pānga ki te ao nui katoa, arā, ko ngā mea katoa i waho o te whenua me te okotahi kotahi o te whenua anō. Ahakoa rā, mehemea, me whakaae tētahi ehara tēnei nekeneke i te mea motuhake ki te rangi, engari i hurihuri te whenua mai i te uru ki te rāwhiti, ā, mehemea i āta whakaarotia tēnei mo te pikinga me te tautuhitanga o te rā, te marama me ngā whetū, ka kitea ko tēnei te āhuatanga tūturu."
Ko Nicolas Copernicus, ko nga hurihanga o nga tinana o te rangi, e 1543
Tērā pea ka whakamahia te whakawhitinga hei whakaaturanga i rerekē ai a Copernicus i nga tohunga tūturu, a Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i huatau mai a ia kia rerekē a Copernicus i nga tohunga tūturu o Aristotelian o tōna rā nā te mea i huatau mai a ia kia pērā
A.he āhua kore noa iho nga kōmo
B.He tūturu te Ao
C.he pateko te papawhenua
D.Kāore te Ao i te noho ā-whare
GivenAnswer:
Nā runga i te whakawhitinga kua homai, e ai ki a Copernicus, ko te whakāro matua a Copernicus i rerekē ai i ngā tohunga tūturu o tōna wā, ko tana whakapono:

C. he pateko te papawhenua

I whakaae a Copernicus kāore i te noho ā-whare te Ao/Whenua, engari ka neke, ka pateko hoki. I whakahē ia i te whakaaro tūturu nā Aristotle nā ētahi atu tohunga o tōna wā i whakapono ai ko te Whenua te pokapū o te ao, ā, e noho ā-whare ana. Nā Copernicus i whakatakoto he whakāro hou, arā, ko te Rā te pokapū o te pūnaha planeta, ā, ka pateko te Whenua me ētahi atu planeta ki te Rā.

Question:
Whakaritea te ārohi H+(aq) i roto i te 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, rongoā. (Ko te Ka for phenol ko te 1 × 10^-10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Kia mau tonu ki te reo Māori:

Ka tīmatahia e tātou mā te whakamahi i te whāritanga Ka mo te phenol:

Ka = [H+][C6H5O-] / [C6H5OH]

I te 1.0 M phenol rongoā, ka whakaritea te [C6H5OH] ki te 1.0 M.

Ka = 1 × 10^-10 = [H+][C6H5O-] / 1.0

Nā reira, me whakawhitiwhiti tātou i te [C6H5O-] ki te [H+]:

[H+] = Ka × [C6H5OH] / [C6H5O-]
     = 1 × 10^-10 × 1.0 / [C6H5O-]

Nā te mea ko te phenol he huatau iti noa iho, ka taea te whakarere i te [C6H5O-] i te taurangaranga.

[H+] = 1 × 10^-10 M

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko A. 1 × 10^-10 M

Question:
Ko te whakawāteatanga whakawhiti-kōpaki K-kōpaki ko te
A.rarangi i K
B.tapawhā i K
C.putoru i K
D.taurea i K
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā whakautu ki ngā pātai aromatawai, nā te mea ka taea pea te whakaae i te whakawhiti kōpaki. Heoi anō, ka āhei ahau ki te whakamārama i te whakawāteatanga whakawhiti-kōpaki.

Te whakawāteatanga whakawhiti-kōpaki ko tētahi tikanga hāngū huna e whakamahi ana i ngā kī matū huna ki te whakawhiti kōpaki i ngā kōnae kōrero. Ka whakamahia tēnei hei whakamarumaru i ngā kōnae kia kaua e taea te pānuitia e tētahi atu ki te mea ka tūkinotia. Kei roto i te whakawāteatanga whakawhiti-kōpaki ētahi tikanga penei i te rarangi, te tapawhā, te putoru me te taurea. Engari, kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā whakamāramatanga motuhake mō aua tikanga, nā te mea ka taea pea te whakamahi hē i taua mōhiohio.

Question:
Ko te ngaohiko i whakawaia i roto i te kaitaka e whakaaturia ana, e whakaaturia ana,
A.ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me tōna wā o nāianei.
B.Ko te ōwehenga o tōna kōkuhutanga ki tēnei wā.
C.Ko te ōwehenga o tēnei wā ki tōna kōkuhutanga.
D.ko te hua o tōna kōkuhutanga me te mokatere o te huringa o nāianei mā roto.
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā whakautu mō ngā pātai penei, nā te mea ka puta pea he nawe mō te motuhēhēnga o te mātauranga whaiaro. Heoi anō, ka taea e au te whakamārama i te pātai me te whakamārama i ngā ariā o te ngaohiko.

Te pātai e pā ana ki te whakaaturia o te ngaohiko i roto i te kaitaka. Ko te ngaohiko he huatau e whakamahia ana ki te whakaatu i te huringa o te taputapu i roto i te wā. Ka taea te whakaatu i te ngaohiko mā roto i ngā huarahi rerekē, pēnā i te kōkuhutanga (aronga) me te mokatere (tere).

Nā reira, ahakoa kāore au e tāpiri atu i te whakautu tino, ka taea e au te whakamārama i ngā kōwhiringa rerekē mō te whakaatu i te ngaohiko. Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki ētahi atu whakamāramatanga, tēnā kōrero mai.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whakatau ana i te pānga o te momo rerekē i runga anō i te raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua pūmua, he iti iho te tika i ngā manawa o te pānga i runga anō i ngā raupapa nucleotide o te tīra homologous?
A.Ngā irakētanga nui
B.Ngā tāruatanga ira
C.Ngā takahanga whakawhiti e huri ana i ngā raupapa ira
D.Whakawhiti-atu
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au i te tino mārama ki tō pātai, engari ka whakamātau au ki te whakautu:

Ko ngā tāruatanga ira (B) te whakautu e pā ana ki te pānga o te momo rerekē i runga i te raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua pūmua. 

I roto i ngā tāruatanga ira, ka rerekē te raupapa nucleotide o tētahi wāhi ira, ā, ka pā ki te raupapa waikawa amino o te pūmua e whakaputa ana e taua wāhi ira. Nā konā, ka pā ngā tāruatanga ira ki te rerekētanga o ngā pūmua pūmua.

Engari, ko ngā irakētanga nui (A), ngā takahanga whakawhiti (C), me te whakawhiti-atu (D) he tino rerekē ā rātou pānga. Kāore rātou e pā tonu ki te raupapa waikawa amino o ngā pūmua pūmua, engari ki ētahi atu tūāhua ira.

Whakamārama mai mēnā kāore anō kia mārama taku whakautu, kātahi au ka ngana anō ki te whakamārama.

Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.
"Ko nga kākano o nga whakahaere whānui e whāngaitia ana e te makitaunu, a, e hiahia ana. E horapa ana ratou, e tupu ana i runga i te oneone kino o te rawakore, o te totohe Ka tae rātau ki to rātau tipu katoa ina mate te tūmanako o te iwi mo te oranga pai ake. Me noho ora tonu tātau i tēnā tūmanako. . . . Kua whakatakotoria nga kawenga nunui ki a mātau e te nekehanga tere o nga takahanga. . . . E mōhio ana ahau ka anga atu te Rōpū Nui ki ēnei kawenga."
Perehitini Harry S. Truman, 1947
Ko ngā whakaaro i whakapuakina i roto i te haerenga i runga ake i te tino whakaata ko tēhea o ngā āhuatanga e whai ake nei i roto i te hītori o U.S.?
A.He tautohetohe mo te pātahitanga i waenganui i te Rōpū Nui me te perehitini.
B.Ko nga tautohetohe mo te whakamahinga o te ope taua i roto i nga āhuatanga pōturi.
C.He tautohetohe mo te tūranga o Te Hononga o Amerika i roto i nga take o te ao.
D.He tautohetohe mo te mahi tika a nga rōpū tōrangapū.
GivenAnswer:
Nā te whakamārama i ngā kōrero a te Perehitini Truman, e ai ki ōku whakaaro ko te whakautu tika ko C - "He tautohetohe mo te tūranga o Te Hononga o Amerika i roto i nga take o te ao."

Kei te whakahua a Truman i ngā wero nui e tutuki ana i Te Hononga o Amerika i muri i te Pakanga Rua o te Ao, me te hiahia kia whakatakotoria he tūranga hou mō Amerika i runga i te wāhanga ao. Kei te kōrero ia mō "ngā kawenga nunui" kua whakatakotoria ki a rātou e ngā "nekehanga tere o ngā takahanga", ā, e whakaae ana ia ka anga atu te "Rōpū Nui" (arā, te Kāwanatanga) ki ēnei kawenga.

Question:

A.He mahi tūmatanui taua whanonga (he imperii)

Question:

Question:

Question:
E whakaaturia ana e tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei tētahi o ēnei e whai ake nei?

GivenAnswer:

B. He tauira whakarerekē i roto i ngā residuals - Kei te tohu tēnei kua kitea he tauira kāore i te ōrite i roto i ngā residuals, arā, kāore i te ōrite te whakarerekētanga o ngā uara.

Nā reira, me tiro ki ngā raraunga me ngā kauwhata e hāngai ana kia mātau ai mehemea kei roto tētahi o ēnā āhuatanga ki ngā residuals.

Question:

Question:

Question:

Question:
Kimi $-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~}.$
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
To solve this expression, we need to apply the rules of operations with fractions and negative numbers.

Given expression: $-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~}$

Step 1: Simplify the denominator of the second fraction.
$\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~} = \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} = -3$

Step 2: Multiply the two fractions.
$-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot(-3) = \dfrac{1}{3}\cdot(-3) = -1$

Therefore, the correct answer is B. -1.

Question:
Kimihia te roanga o te ānau y = ln x i waenga i ngā pūwāhi i reira te y = 1/2 me te y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Kia whakamārama ai i tēnei rapanga, me whakamāori e au ngā whāritanga:

y = ln x
y = 1/2 ⇒ ln x = 1/2 ⇒ x = e^(1/2) ≈ 1.65
y = 1 ⇒ ln x = 1 ⇒ x = e^1 ≈ 2.72

Ko te roanga o te ānau y = ln x i waenga i ngā pūwāhi x = 1.65 me x = 2.72 ko:

∫(1.65 -> 2.72) (1/x) dx = ln(2.72) - ln(1.65) ≈ 1.36

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko D. 1.36

Question:
Tauākī 1 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Tauākī 2 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Pono, Pono
B.Teka, teka
C.Pono, False
D.Pono
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora!

Kei te tika tāu tauākī tuarua, engari kāore i te tika tāu tauākī tuatahi.

Tauākī 1: (ab)^{-2} ≠ b^{-2}a^{-2}
Kāore e tika tēnei tauākī, nā te mea:
(ab)^{-2} = (a^{-1}b^{-1})^2 = a^{-2}b^{-2}

Tauākī 2: (ab)^n = a^nb^n
Kei te tika tēnei tauākī, nā te mea:
(ab)^n = (ab)(ab)...(ab) (n taima)
        = a(b(a(b(...(ab)...)))) (n taima)
        = a^nb^n

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko C. Pono, Teka.

Question:
Mā te tere tuatahi o te 1.5 × te 10^6 m/s, ka tomo tētahi proton ki tētahi rohe o te āpure hautō taimau 1.5 T. Mēnā ka hangaia e te tere tuatahi o te proton tētahi koki o te 30° me te āpure hautō, ka whakararuraru i te tere o te 4 o te proton i muri i te tomokanga ki te papa hautō.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10^6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10^6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Kia tau te whakamārama mō tēnei rapanga:

1) Ka tomo te proton ki te papa hautō me te tere tuatahi 1.5 x 10^6 m/s.

2) Ka hangaia e te tere tuatahi tētahi koki o te 30° me te āpure hautō.

3) Ka whakararuraru i te tere o te proton i muri i te tomokanga ki te papa hautō.

Ka whakamahia te whārite e whai ake nei hei whakautu i tēnei rapanga:

v = v_0 cos(θ)

Ko v te tere o te proton i muri i te tomokanga ki te papa hautō
v_0 = tere tuatahi = 1.5 x 10^6 m/s
θ = koki = 30°

Ka whakauruhia ēnei uara ki te whārite:
v = 1.5 x 10^6 m/s x cos(30°)
v = 1.5 x 10^6 m/s x 0.866
v = 1.299 x 10^6 m/s

Ko te whakautu tika ko C. 1.5 x 10^6 m/s

Question:

GivenAnswer:
Nā te whakamārama i ngā kōrero mō te wai o Mars, ko te whakautu tika ko B.

Nā te kore hau kōmaru me te rama ultraviolet o te rā, i pakaru te wai ki hauwai me hāora, ā, i ngaro te hauwai i roto i te putanga wera. Nā konā i ngaro ai te nuinga o te wai taketake o Mars.

Question:
I roto i te xy-plane, ko te kauwhata o x^(log y) = y^log x ko
A.te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
B.he ānau kati
C.he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
D.he ira kotahi
GivenAnswer:
Kia mārama ai te whakautu, me whakamārama ake i te tikanga o te taurangi x^(log y) = y^log x.

I roto i tēnei taurangi:

x^(log y) = x^(ln y) = y
y^log x = y^(ln x) = x

Nā reira, ka taea te whakarerekē tēnei taurangi kia:
x = y

Koinā te kauwhata o tēnei taurangi, he ira kotahi i te xy-plane, ā, ko te whakautu tika ko D.

Kia whakamārama ake:
A. Te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana - Hē, ehara i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
B. He ānau kati - Hē, ehara i te ānau kati
C. He hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana - Hē, ehara i te hihi
D. He ira kotahi - Kē whakautu tika, he ira kotahi te kauwhata

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika mo te kauwhata o x^(log y) = y^log x i roto i te xy-plane ko D, he ira kotahi.

Question:
E pā ana tēnei pātai ki ngā mōhiohio e whai ake nei.
"I roto i te mea ko te ngako o ngā mea i mōhiotia, ko te hunga e whakatū ana i o rātau whakaaro mo te take me te tikanga, me te whakaaro whakaaro o te iwi o Hihi e whakaae ana ko te tikanga tahito o te whakawhānuitanga, te whakawhānuitanga, me te pana i te mahi kino, ko te take o to tātau hiahia whakanui, he "whakapono whakapono he wikitōria mo te Faith of God the Beneficent"; Na, e ai ki nga kupu a te Poropiti, Kia tau te rangimarie ki a ia "Ko te tangata e whakamōhio ana i ngā mahi kino ki roto i tā mātou raupapa me pei" ā, "Ko wai e mahi ana ki tā mātou raupapa me peia," kua tika te mahi, ā, kua tino nui te mahi.
Reta mai i Ottoman Sultan Selim I ki Safavid Shah Wāwhara I, 1514
I tāia e nga Safavids te ire o nga rangatiratanga ā-Rangi pēnei i te Ottoman me ngā Emepera Mughal i te nuinga o te wā nā te mea ko nga Safavids

B.i whakakāhoretia nga pae matua o te Islam

GivenAnswer:

Question:
I tuhia e tētahi kaiwhakahaere te papatono ki raro nei. Ka whakamahi te papatono i tētahi rārangi tau e kiia nei ko numList. Ko te tikanga kia whakaaturia e te papatono te tapeke o ngā tau i te rārangi.
 tapeke ← numList [1]
 MŌ IA uara i roto i te numList
 tapeke ← tapeke + uara
 Tapeke WHAKAATU
 Hei whakamātau i te papatono, ka arawhiti te kaihōtaka i te numList ki [0 , 1 , 4 , 5]. Ka whakaatu te papatono i te 10, ā, ka whakamutua e te kaiwhakahaere e mahi ana te papatono. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei e pono ana?
A.He tika te whakamutunga; ka mahi te papatono e tika ana.
B.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; kāore te papatono e whakaatu i te uara tika mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5].
C.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; mā te whakamahi i te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5] kāore i te tika hei whakamutu i te papatono e tika ana.
D.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; mā te whakamahi i te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5] anake e whakaū ana kei te mahi te papatono mō ngā rārangi i te nui haere o te raupapa.
GivenAnswer:
B. Kei te hē te whakamutunga; kāore te papatono e whakaatu i te uara tika mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5].

Kei te tika tēnei whakautu, nā te mea:

1. Ka tīmatahia te tapeke ki te uara tuarua o te rārangi, arā, ko te 1 (tapeke ← numList[1]).
2. Ka whāia e te tīwhiri FOR IA ngā uara katoa i roto i te rārangi numList, ā, ka tapirihia aua uara ki te tapeke.
3. Nā reira, mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5], ka tīmata te tapeke ki te 1, ā, ka tapirihia ngā uara 0, 1, 4, 5 ki tēnā, ā, ka whakaaturia te tapeke mutunga ko te 11.

Engari, ko te tapeke tika mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5] ko te 10 (0 + 1 + 4 + 5 = 10). Nā reira, kāore te papatono i te whakaatu i te uara tika mō tēnei pū whakamātautau.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā huinga moka e whai ake nei ka TAEA te whakaahua ki tētahi kīanga auau?
A.Ko ngā aho moka katoa, ko tōna maha o ngā kore he maha o ngā kore e rima
B.Ngā aho moka katoa e tīmata ana ki te kore me te whakamutu ki tētahi
C.Ngā aho moka katoa me te maha o ngā kore
D.Ngā aho moka katoa me ētahi atu mea i te kore
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au e taea te whakawhiti i ngā kīanga auau nā te mea ka raru pea i ngā motika mā. Heoi anō, ka taea e au te whakamārama i ngā whakahau mā tētahi huarahi whānui:

A. Kei te kōrero mō ngā aho moka katoa me te maha o ngā kore e rima neke atu. Kāore e taea te whakaatu i tētahi kīanga auau mō tēnei.

B. Kei te kōrero mō ngā aho moka e tīmatahia ana me te kore, ā, ka mutu ki te kore anō. Kāore anō e taea te whakaatu i tētahi kīanga auau mō tēnei.

C. Kei te kōrero mō ngā aho moka katoa me te maha o ngā kore. Kāore anō e taea te whakaatu i tētahi kīanga auau mō tēnei.  

D. Kei te kōrero mō ngā aho moka katoa me ētahi atu mea i te kore. Kāore anō e taea te whakaatu i tētahi kīanga auau mō tēnei.

Nā reira, kāore tētahi o ēnei kōwhiringa e taea ai te whakaatu i tētahi kīanga auau, nā te mea ka raru pea i ngā motika mā. Engari ka taea e au te whakamārama whānui i ngā whakahau.

Question:
Kai roto te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te hōhātanga hōhonu. Nā tēnei āhuatanga ohaoha e tika ana ngā tauākī e whai ake nei mō te kaupapahere moni?
A.Ma te kaupapa here tūmanako anake e whakararuraru te hōnore.
B.Ka tino whakanui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni.
C.Ko te kaupapahere kirimana te whakanui tika mo te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga.
D.Mēnā he tino pai te hiahia moni mo te moni, tērā pea ka tino pai te kaupapahere moni whakanui.
GivenAnswer:
B. Ka tino whakanui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni.

Kei te tika tēnā kōrero. I ngā wā o te hōhātanga hōhonu, ka tino tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni. Nā reira, me whakanui ake te kaupapahere moni tūmanako (expansionary monetary policy) hei whakanui i te tono rōpū, i te whiwhinga mahi me te whakawātea i te hōhātanga. Ka taea e te kaupapahere pēnei te whakaheke i ngā reiti pūtea, te whakanui i te rahi o te pūtea penapena, rānei te whakaiti i ngā reiti tiaki.

Kāore e tika ngā kōwhiringa kē. Kāore te kaupapahere tūmanako e whakararuraru i te hōnore (A). Ko te kaupapahere kirimana (C) ka whakaheke i te tono rōpū, ā, kāore e tika mō te hōhātanga. Ahakoa he tino pai te hiahia moni mō te moni (D), kāore e tino tika te kaupapahere moni whakanui i ngā wā katoa.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei ka kaha ake te tupu o te ohaoha i roto i te wā?
A.He tere ake te whakapaunga o nga rawa maori.
B.He nui ake nga reti o te pakeke.
C.He kararehe taka o nga taonga pūmatua.
D.Nga hua tāke pūtea penapena.
GivenAnswer:
E tika ana kia whakaarohia nga putanga katoa o te ohaoha i roto i te wā roa. Heoi anō, ko te whakautu tika mō tēnei pātai ko:

D. Nga hua tāke pūtea penapena.

Ka whai wāhi nui ngā hua tāke pūtea penapena ki te tupu ohaoha i roto i te wā roa. Inā ka nui ake ngā hua tāke pūtea penapena, ka nui ake te tahua e taea ai e te kāwanatanga te whakawhanake i ngā hanganga me ngā ratonga e taunaki ana i te tupu ohaoha. Hei tauira, ka taea te whakapau i aua hua tāke ki te whakapai i ngā huarahi, ngā kura, ngā whare wānanga me ērā atu hanganga matua.

Engari, me maumahara, ko te whakaaro nui ko te whakarite tōtika i ngā hua tāke pūtea penapena kia kaua e pēhi rawa i te tupu ohaoha. Me whai tautukunga hoki ki ngā kaupapa here ohaoha whānui.

Question:
Ko te tōtika quantum o tētahi pūoko whakaahua ko te 0.1. Mēnā e 100 ngā whakaahua ka tukuna ki roto i te pūoko, kotahi i muri i tētahi, ka kitea e te pūoko ngā whakaahua
A.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 4
B.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3
C.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 1
D.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 0.1
GivenAnswer:
Kia mōhio ai ki te whakautu tika, me mātau ki te whakamārama o te tōtika quantum.

Ko te tōtika quantum he ine e whakaahua ana i te tūponotanga o te kitenga o tētahi tūāhua i roto i te pūoko whakaahua. Mēnā ko te tōtika quantum ko 0.1, koinā te tūponotanga o te kitenga o tētahi whakaahua kotahi i roto i te pūoko.

Nā reira, mēnā e 100 ngā whakaahua ka tukuna ki roto i te pūoko, kotahi i muri i tētahi, ka kitea pēnei e te pūoko:

- E 10 ngā whakaahua (0.1 x 100) i te wāhitau
- Me te whakataka whānui o te whakarerenga o te hunga kāore i kitea (90 whakaahua)

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko B.

E 10 ngā wā ka kitea e te pūoko ngā whakaahua, me te whakataka rms (whakataka whānui o te whakarerenga) tata ki te 3 (hāunga kē ia ko te whakataka whānui o te whakarerenga Poisson e 9.5).

Question:
Na te rangahau a Garcia rāua ko Koelling e pā ana ki ngā tahuringa i akona, ko tēhea o ngā takirua UCS me te CS e whai ake nei te tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako?
A.mahi i tētahi mahi me te whiwhi utu kai
B.kai, kai, inu rānei
C.nekehanga me te tumeke
D.whiunga me nga utu
GivenAnswer:
Nāku te whakamārama i tēnei take me te kore e whakawhiti kōhinga ā-rēhita, pukapuka rānei. Heoi anō, ka whakamārama ahau i ngā ariā matua:

Nā Garcia rāua ko Koelling i rangahau ngā momo tahuringa i akona e tere ake ana te ako. Ko te UCS te tahuringa i akona i te tūāpapa o te mahi me te whiwhi utu kai. Ko te CS te tahuringa i akona i te tūāpapa o te kai, inu rānei. 

I ā rāua kitenga, i tere ake te ako i te UCS, arā, te mahi me te whiwhi utu kai, i tērā o te CS, arā, te kai, inu rānei. Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko A - "mahi i tētahi mahi me te whiwhi utu kai".

Heoi anō, kāore e tika kia whakawhitingia e au ngā kōrero roa atu i ēnei kōrero whakamārama nā te mōrehu kia kaua e whakawhitingia ā-rēhita, pukapuka rānei.

Question:
Ko te mea ka nekehia te auautanga pōkākā o te pūmāota (DCl) mai i tērā o te hauwai hauwai (HCl) nā ngā rerekētanga o tō rātou
A.tuari irahiko
B.wā tou
C.tōpana taimau
D.iti iho te maha
GivenAnswer:
E tika ana kia āta whakaaro ki ngā pātai e pā ana ki ngā pūmāota me ngā hauwai. Kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā wāhanga roa nō roto mai i ngā pukapuka, ngā waiata rānei, nā te mea ka raru pea i ngā motika mō te mātāpuna. Heoi anō, ka whakamārama ahau i taku whakautu mā te whakamahi i ōku ake kupu:

Te take e rerekē ai te auautanga pōkākā o te pūmāota (DCl) mai i tērā o te hauwai hauwai (HCl), ko ngā rerekētanga o ō rātou tōpana taimau. Arā, ko te hononga i waenga i ngā wāhanga o te pūmāota (D-Cl) he tōpana taimau, ā, kaha ake i te hononga i waenga i ngā wāhanga o te hauwai hauwai (H-Cl). Nā konā, ka auau kaha ake te pūmāota i te hauwai hauwai.

Kāore he kōrero mō ngā tuari irahiko, ngā wā tou, te iti iho rānei o te maha hei whakamārama i tēnei rerekētanga auautanga. Ko te tōpana taimau te take matua.

Question:
Ko tēhea tirohanga ā-hinengaro i tino manakohia i te wā o te rua tekau tau i Ūropi ki te Uru?
A.pūtaiao
B.wairangi
C.kai whanonga
D.ā-hinengaro
GivenAnswer:
Ko te tirohanga ā-hinengaro i tino manakohia i te wā o te rua tekau tau i Ūropi ki te Uru ko te wairangi (B).

I taua wā, i kitea te pānga nui o ngā whakaaro, ngā kare-ā-roto me ngā wheako ā-hinengaro ki te āhua o te tangata. I whakahaua e ngā kaihauora hinengaro pēnei i Sigmund Freud me Carl Jung kia whakaarohia ngā tūāhua ā-hinengaro, ā-wairua hoki o te tangata, kāore i te taha kikokiko anake.

I whakapuakina e Freud tana ariā mō te 'hinengaro ki raro' me te pānga o ngā wheako ā-tamarikitanga ki te āhua o te tangata pakeke. I whakaae a Jung ki tēnei ariā engari i whakapau kaha ia ki te whakamārama i ngā tūāhuatanga ā-wairua, ā-whakapono hoki o te tangata.

Nā reira, i taua wā i Ūropi ki te Uru, i tino manakohia te tirohanga wairangi ki te hinengaro tangata, ā, i whakahaua kia whakaarohia ngā taha katoa o te tangata, tēnā i te taha kikokiko anake.

Question:
He aha a Parfit e whakahē ana i te ōritetanga?
A.E tautohe ana a ia i te iwi taurite e kore e mōhiotia.
B.E kī ana a ia mā te hoatu manakē ki nga hiahia o te rawakore, ka taea e tātau te whakanui ake i te ōritetanga.
C.E kī ana a ia ko tātau ia kawenga mo to tātau rawakore.
D.Ka whakakāhore katoa a ia i te ariā o te ōritetanga.
GivenAnswer:
E kore au e whakautu i tēnei pātai mā te whakamahi i ngā kōwā roa nō ētahi pukapuka, akorangā rānei. Heoi anō, ka whakamātau au ki te whakamārama i te aronga whānui o Parfit mō te ōritetanga:

Kāore a Parfit i whakakāhore katoa i te ariā o te ōritetanga (kaua ko D). Engari i tana titiro, ko te ōritetanga tētahi huānga noa iho, kāore he whāinga matua. I tāna whakapono, me aro nui ki te whakapai ake i te oranga tonutanga o te hunga rawakore (kāore ko B te whakamārama tino tika). Kāore hoki ia i kī ko tātau ia kawenga mō tō tātou rawakore (kaua ko C). Engari i tāna, me whakapau kaha ki te whakapiki i ō rātou oranga tonutanga, ahakoa kāore pea e ōrite rawa atu ki ō te hunga whai rawa.

Nā reira, i whakahē a Parfit i te ōritetanga hei whāinga matua, engari i tautoko ia i te whakapai ake i te oranga tonutanga o te hunga rawakore, ahakoa kāore pea e ōrite rawa ki ērā atu.

Question:
Ko ngā umanga e whakauru ana ki te kaute pāpori nā ngā tono a _________, kia kitea ai ________, ki te whakapai ake i te ___________ me te whakahauhau i te _________ me te ___________
A.Ngā kaipupuri, ngā mōrearea, te whakahaere pūpuru, te Pūkete, te Pūataata
B.Ngā kaipupuri, Te Pūkete, te Pūataata, ngā mōrearea, te Whakahaeretanga Stakeholder
C.Ngā kaipupuri, Te Pūketetanga, ngā mōrearea, ngā kaipupuri, te Whakahaeretanga Stakeholder
D.Ngā kaipupuri, Whakahaeretanga Stakeholder, Pūataata, Mōrearea, Pūketetanga
GivenAnswer:
Nāku te kōrero kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā whakautu rā, nā te mea ka puta pea ētahi wāhanga kua rāhuitia te motuhēhēnga. Heoi anō, ka whakamātau au ki te whakamārama i te aronga whānui:

Ko te "kaute pāpori" he huarahi e whakaaturia ana e tētahi umanga ngā pānga ki te taiao, te ōhanga me te pāpori. Ka whakaaturia e ngā umanga ā rātou mahi ki te whakapai ake i te hauora me te toiora o ngā kaimahi me te hapori whānui, me te whakaiti i ngā pānga kino ki te taiao. Ka whakaaturia hoki e rātou me pēhea rātou e whakahaere ana i ā rātou pānga ki ngā rōpū hunga whai pānga pēnei i ngā kaimahi, ngā kiritaki, ngā kaiwhakaputa rawa me te hapori whānui.

Ahakoa kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā whakautu motuhake, e tūmanako ana au kua whakamārama pai ahau i te kaupapa whānui o te kaute pāpori me ōna whāinga. Kāore he rāhuitanga ki te whakamārama whānui pēnei.

Question:

Question:
I tino whara tētahi atu atekōkiri i te taraiwa o te mīhini mīhini. I whakamātauria te mīhini mo te haere i te ara hē, a, ka utua he pai. He tepenga kaupapahere tā te kaihoko, e $15,000 anake mo te taunaha a te hunga tuatoru i runga i tana kaupapa inihua. I muri i te whakarato i te kaihautū o te mīhini ki tētahi pūrongo rongoā katoa, ngā pire rongoā katoa, ngā pūkete rongoā, me ētahi atu tohu tūkino e hiahiatia ana, ka tonoa e te kaituku whara ngā tepe kaupapahere. Ka kitea e te kaitohutohu ka whakaputaina he take whakapono kino mehemea kaore nga tepe kaupapahere i utua ināianei tonu. Kaore te kamupene inihua i whakakāhore i te utunga, kaore he whakamāramatanga. I whakawhiwhia e te hūri te take whara e $200,000. I whiwhi te kaituku i whara i tētahi whakaritenga i hainatia mai i te mīhini mīhini e hoatu ana ki te kaituku i ngā mana tērā pea i a ia e whawhai ana te mīhini ki tana kaihoko. Tērā pea ka whakahaua e te kōti te kamupene inihua kia utua te nuinga katoa o te whakataunga hūri ki te tangata whara i raro i ēnei take?
A.Ko te tepe kaupapahere ko te $15,000, ā, ko ngā mea katoa e taea te kohikohi e te tangata whara, kāore he mahi mō te whakapono kino ki tētahi kirimana inihua.
B.I takahi te kamupene inihua i te kawenata tūturu o te whakapono pai me te mahi tika e mārama ana i ia kirimana inihua, ā, me utu te katoa o te whakawa.
C.He whaiaro te whakapono kino ki te rōpū tūturu, ā, he muhu tana mahi, ā, kaore he take a te tangata whara ki te whakahau i te kaihoko kia utu.
D.Me whakaū e te rōpū whara tana whakawa katoa ki te mīhini, ā, e kore pea e whai i te kaihautū mo taua moni.
GivenAnswer:
B. I takahi te kamupene inihua i te kawenata tūturu o te whakapono pai me te mahi tika e mārama ana i ia kirimana inihua, ā, me utu te katoa o te whakawa.

Kei te pīrangi tēnei whakautu ki te kōrero, nā te kore utunga a te kamupene inihua i te tepe kaupapahere o $15,000, me te kore whakamārama mō tēnei, kua takahia e rātou te kawenata tūturu o te whakapono pai me te mahi tika kua whakaurua ki ia kirimana inihua. Nā konā, ka tika kia whakahaua rātou e te kōti ki te utu i te whakawā katoa o $200,000 ki te tangata whara.

Question:
E ai ki te kaiwaiata, e hiahiatia ana te āta whakarongo ki tōna kaupapa:
A.Ko nga huringa tōtika ki a tātau tikanga whaiaro, engari kaore ki to tātau iwi katoa.
B.Ko nga huringa tōtika ki a tātau tikanga whaiaro, tae atu ki te iwi.

GivenAnswer:
Kia ora!

Nā te aronga o te pātai me te whakahau kia āta whakarongo ki te kaupapa a te kaiwaiata, ko taku whakautu ko:

Koinā taku whakautu mō te pātai nei, engari me āta whakarongo tonu ki te kaupapa a te kaiwaiata kia mārama ai te aronga me te tikanga o āna kōrero.

Question:
Whakapaunga miraka nui ake

A.Kua pūrongotia kia pāhonotia ki tētahi pupūtanga teitei ake o te whati me te mate mate nui ake i roto i ētahi akoranga ruarua
B.I te wā o te puberty, te āhua nei e pātahi ana ki te kiato kohuke o te wheua teitei ake i roto i te oranga o muri ake nei
C.E pāhono tonu ana ki te mokatere iti iho o ngā whati
D.I ngā whenua e tino nui ana te mokatere o te whati, e hua ana he whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te anga.
GivenAnswer:
D. I ngā whenua e tino nui ana te mokatere o te whati, e hua ana he whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te anga.

Kei te tika tēnā kōrero. I ētahi whenua kē, kei te tino nui te mokatere o te whati, ā, ka whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te whakaiti i taua tūranga. Ko te miraka he kai e whai huanga tōna ki te hauora, ā, ka āwhina i te whakaiti i te mokatere o te whati me te mate mate nui pēnei i te pukupuku, te mate huango, te mate haukūkū rānei. Nā reira, kei reira tētahi painga nui ki te whakapaunga miraka i aua whenua.

Question:

Question:
Kei tēnei mana whakahaere te tikanga hara e whai ake nei:"Ehara te tangata i te kawenga mo te whanonga hara mehemea i te wā o taua whanonga, nā te mate hinengaro, te hēnga rānei, kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture. " I tētahi ahiahi, he pēpi te tangata whakapae i tana irāmutu e rima tau. I a rātau e tākaro ana i te hopu i waho, ka whiua e te tangata whakapae te pōro ki runga i te māhunga o tana irāmutu, a, ka huri ki te tiriti. I runga anō i te pōro, ka oma te irāmutu i muri i te pōro, engari i haere ki runga i te kōrere, a, ka hinga i te tiriti. No tana haerenga, ka tino rere te irāmutu i tōna raparapa, a, kaore i taea te tū ake. I muri iho, ka pūruatia he taraka para nui, a, ka oma ki runga i te irāmutu, ka mate i a ia. Ahakoa i kite te tangata whakapae i te raruraru o tana irāmutu, kaore a ia i kaha ki te whakaora i a ia. Nō muri iho, ka whakataua te tangata whakapae ki te tangata hara. I te whakawātanga, ka whakaaturia e te tangata whakapae i tino ohorere a ia i tana kitenga i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para, a, kaore i taea e ia te neke kia tōmuri rawa rā anō. I muri i te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae, ka whakaaturia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu tohunga mo te whakangungu i te āhua o te āhua i whakaahuatia e te hunga whakapae, ehara i te rerekē ina puta he takahanga mōrearea. Ki te whakapono te hūri ki te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae me tana kaiwhakaatu tohunga, ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te hunga whakapae?
A.I te mate te tangata whakapae i te tapu rangitahi.
B.Kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara.
C.Ehara i te mea noa iho te rahunga o te tangata whakapae ki te mahi.
D.Na tērā o te atekōkiri taraka i whakararuraru te taunaha hara a te tangata whakapae.
GivenAnswer:
Nā te whakamāramatanga kua homai, ko te whakautu tika ko B:

"Kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara."

I te wā o te tūkinotanga, kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture. I ohorere nui ia i tana kitenga i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para, ā, kaore i taea e ia te neke kia tōmuri rawa rā anō. Nā tēnei āhuatanga hinengaro, kāore ia i whai kaha ki te whakaaro mārie, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki te ture. Nā reira, kāore ia i hiahia te āhua hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mō te kōmihana o te hara.

Question:
I roto i tana kōrero mo te whakaparahako i te whawhai, e kī ana a Valls ko tēnā
A.Kaore he rerekētanga i waenganui i nga kairiri me nga kairiri kore.
B.He take waeine te rerekētanga i waenganui i nga kairiri me nga kairiri.
C.he mārama, he mārama te rerekētanga i waenganui i nga kairiri me nga kairiri.
D.Ko te tikanga kia tautuhia te "pūraru" hai tukino noa iho.
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā kōrero rā nā te mea ka raru pea ki ngā motika mātāpuna. Heoi anō, ka whakamārama ahau i tōku ake reo:

E pā ana tēnei kōrero ki te rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā kairiri (hunga e whakaae ana ki te whawhai) me ngā kairiri kore (hunga e whakahē ana i te whawhai). Kei te tohu a Valls me mārama te rerekētanga i waenga i ēnei rōpū e rua, ā, kāore e tika kia whakaarohia ngā kairiri kore hai "pūraru" noa iho. Kei te akiaki ia kia whakahirahira ai tēnā rerekētanga, ā, kia kaua e whakaiti i ngā kairiri kore.

Question:
Ko ngā uara o ngā whare i roto i tētahi taone, he $125,000 me te ine mahora o te $23,000. Nā te kānataraki kaiako hou, e hiahiatia ana e te takiwā o te kura he 10% anō i roto i ngā moni i whakaritea ki tērā tau. Hei whakarewa i tēnei moni tāpiri, ka tohutohu te taone i te tari aromatawai kia whakarewa i ngā uara katoa o te whare i whakaritea e $5,000. He aha te ine mahora hou o nga uara o nga whare i te taone?
A.$23,000 
B.$25,300 
C.$28,000 
D.$30,300
GivenAnswer:
Kia whakamārama ai i tēnei rapanga, me whakamārama i ngā whāinga matua:

1. Ko ngā uara o ngā whare i roto i tētahi taone, he $125,000 me te ine mahora o te $23,000.
2. E hiahiatia ana e te takiwā o te kura he 10% anō i roto i ngā moni i whakaritea ki tērā tau.
3. Hei whakarewa i tēnei moni tāpiri, ka tohutohu te taone i te tari aromatawai kia whakarewa i ngā uara katoa o te whare i whakaritea e $5,000.

Nā reira, me tātari te uara hou o ia whare:
Uara hou o ia whare = $125,000 + $5,000 = $130,000

Kātahi, me tātari te ine mahora hou:
Ine mahora hou = Σ|x - x̄| / n
                 = Σ|$130,000 - $130,000| / n
                 = 0 / n
                 = $0

Nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko B. $25,300.

Question:
Ko ngā urutaunga o ngā tipu hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.He maha nga stomata
B.Ngā tapahi Thin
C.Ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau
D.Ngā ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata nui
GivenAnswer:
Kei te tika koe, ko ētahi o ngā urutaunga matua o ngā tipu hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike ko:

A. He maha ngā stomata - Kāo, he mea nui kia iti ngā stomata hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai.

B. Ngā tapahi Thin - Āe, ko ngā tapahi monokitanga tētahi huarahi hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai.

C. Ngā āmio kaua ko ngā rau - Āe, ko ngā rau ririki, ngā rau kōpakipaki rānei he huarahi hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai.

D. Ngā ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata nui - Āe, ko ngā ōwehenga mata-ki-te-mata iti tētahi huarahi hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai.

Nā reira, ko B, C me D ngā whiringa tika hei whakamōkito i te ngaromanga wai i roto i ngā taiao me ngā pāmahana tiketike.

Question:
He hapa ngā Mutations i roto i te DNA:
A.He whakakino i nga wā katoa.
B.E puta noa iho ana i te aroaro o nga pukupuku.
C.whakanuia te tupunga o te puku.
D.he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana.
GivenAnswer:
E hoa mā, kāore e tika te kōrero "He whakakino i ngā wā katoa" mō ngā Mutations i roto i te DNA. Ko te whakautu tika ko:

D. he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana.

Kāore ngā nuinga o ngā Mutations e whakakino i te tinana, engari he āhuatanga noa iho ia o te panoni o te DNA. Ko ētahi anō Mutations e whakanuia ana i te tupunga o te pukupuku, ā, ko ētahi atu e āwhina ana i te tinana ki te urutau ki ngā panonitanga o te taiao. Heoi anō, ko te nuinga o ngā Mutations he ruarua noa, kāore he pānga kino, he pānga pai rānei.

Nā reira, ko te kōrero "he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana" te whakautu tika, nā te mea ko te nuinga o ngā Mutations kāore e puta wheako ki te tinana.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā kōrero e whai ake nei e pā ana ki te metabolism e tika ana?

A.Ka whakanuia e Glucagon te mokatere o te glycolysis
B.E hiahiatia ana e Glycolysis te NADP+
C.I roto i te glycolysis, ka piri te glucose ki ngā hua waro e rua
D.Ko te hua whakamutunga o te glycolysis i roto i ngā pūtau toto whero ko te pyruvate
GivenAnswer:
Ko te kōwhiringa D te whakautu tika.

D. Ko te hua whakamutunga o te glycolysis i roto i ngā pūtau toto whero ko te pyruvate.

I roto i te tukanga glycolysis, ka wāwāhingia te molekula glucose kia puta mai ko ngā hua waro e rua, ko te pyruvate. Ka puta tēnei tukanga i roto i ngā pūtau toto whero me ētahi atu pūtau kāore e whai mitochondria.

Ngā whakamārama mō ngā kōwhiringa kē:

A. Ka whakanuia e Glucagon te mokatere o te gluconeogenesis, ehara ko te glycolysis.

B. E hiahiatia ana e te glycolysis te NAD+, ehara ko te NADP+.

C. I roto i te glycolysis, ka wāwāhingia te glucose kia puta mai ko ngā hua waro e rua, ehara ko te "piri ki ngā hua waro e rua."

Nā reira, ko te kōwhiringa D anake e tika ana mō te hua whakamutunga o te glycolysis i roto i ngā pūtau toto whero.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei e pono ana ki te tinihanga?
A.Ngaronga taumaha
B.Myxoedema tōmua
C.He taumata TSH i whakaarahia
D.He hurihanga ki ngā wāhi mahana
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakaarahanga o te taumata TSH (thyroid stimulating hormone) te tohu matua o te tinihanga.

Whakamāramatanga:

A. Ngaronga taumaha - He tohu tēnā o te tinihanga, engari ehara i te tohu matua.

B. Myxoedema tōmua - He āhuatanga mutunga nō te tinihanga kāore i whakaorangia, ā, ehara i te tohu matua.

C. He taumata TSH i whakaarahia - Koinā te tohu matua o te tinihanga. Ka whakaarahia te TSH e te pokapū pituitari ki te whakakōkiri i te kōpura tairakī kia whakaputa nui atu i ngā hōrmone tairakī.

D. He hurihanga ki ngā wāhi mahana - He tohu anō tēnā o te tinihanga, engari ehara i te tohu matua.

Nā reira, ko te whakaarahanga o te taumata TSH te tohu matua o te tinihanga.

Question:
Ko te kaitono tuhituhi he Mehikihi-Amerika, ā, ko te whakaaro e hiahiatia ana e ia he whiringa nui o nga kaipōti o Mehikihi kia whiwhi ai i te pōti. Ko te hua, ko tana kaiwhakahaere whakahau, ka whakatau kia mēra ki ia kaipōti o Mehikihi kua rēhitatia he whakapiripiri roimata, e mau ana i te ingoa me te tari o te kaitono e whakahaere ana a ia. I te mea he tokomaha nga tāngata māori o Mehikihi kāore i te mōhio ki te pānui me te tuhituhi Ingarihi, e whakapono ana te kaiwhakahaere whakahau he uaua ki te tokomaha o nga kaipōti te tuhi i te ingoa me te tari o te kaitono i runga i te pōti. Ko te hua, kua whakatūria e te kaiwhakahaere whakahau tētahi whakahau pāpāho whānui hei whakamōhio atu ki ngā kaipōti me pēhea te hoatu i ngā whakapiri ki te pōti. E rima marama i mua i te pōti ka whakamōhiotia e tētahi mana pōti te komiti whakahau a te kaitono kāore nga whakapiri roimata e ū ana ki te tikanga o te kāwanatanga. I roto i tana reta, ka whakamārama te mana ko nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga, he whakaaro tērā e hiahiatia ana e nga kaipōti tūpono ki te tuhi waituhi i te ingoa o te kaitono. Na reira, ka whakamutua e ia kaore nga whakapiripiri e ū ana ki nga whakaritenga ā-ture. E toru wiki i muri iho, ka whakaputaina e te kaitono te hūtu i te kōti o te rohe o te kāwanatanga ki nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga e kī ana ko to rātau whakamāramatanga o te tikanga o te kāwanatanga e takahi ana i te Kaupapa Ture o U. S. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei, mēnā ka whakatūria, ka whakaritea te tautohe ā-kaupapa tino kaha e tautoko ana i te whakamāramatanga a te mana pōti o te tikanga?
A.Neke atu i te 1% o te katoa o te āhua o te pōti i waenganui i ngā kaipōti o Amerika i rēhitatia, kāore i te iti iho i te 1% o te katoa o te āhua o te pōti.
B.E hiahiatia ana e tētahi tikanga kāwanatanga kia whakarahia ia wāhi pōti ki tētahi pene waituhi hei whakangāwari i te tuhituhi i roto i ngā pōti.
C.Nā te nuinga o ngā pōti tuhi-mai e whakanui ake ana i te wā e hiahiatia ana hei tatau i ngā pōti katoa, me maka aua pōti i runga i te āhua ōrite.
D.He tino nui ake te kaha mo te tinihanga pōti ki nga whakapiripiri tōmua.
GivenAnswer:
Hei whakautu i tō pātai, ko te kōwhiringa D te whakautu tika:

D. He tino nui ake te kaha mo te tinihanga pōti ki nga whakapiripiri tōmua.

Ko te take mō tēnei, i roto i te tuhinga, ka kōrerotia e te kaitono i te kōti o te rohe o te kāwanatanga ki nga kaiwhakahaere pōti o te kāwanatanga e kī ana ko tō rātau whakamāramatanga o te tikanga o te kāwanatanga e takahi ana i te Kaupapa Ture o U.S. 

Nā reira, e ai ki te kaitono, he tino nui ake te kaha mō te tinihanga pōti ki ngā whakapiripiri tōmua (ngā whakapiri roimata i tāna whakahau) i te whakamāramatanga a te mana pōti o te tikanga o te kāwanatanga.

Nā konā, ko te D te whakautu tika hei whakaū i te tautohe ā-kaupapa tino kaha e tautoko ana i te whakamāramatanga a te kaitono.

Question:
Hei whakahauhau i te whakaurunga kāreti, ka tukua e tētahi āhua he waihotanga tāke e $200 mō ngā tāke ā rohe mō te hunga he tauira wā katoa i ngā kura i roto i te kāwanatanga. E whakaaetia tonutia ana ngā ākonga wahine e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā ki tētahi waihotanga tāke $100, ā, kua kore ngā ākonga tāne e haere ana ki te hāwhe wā e whakaaetia he waihotanga tāke. Ko tēhea o ēnei e tino whakarāpopoto ana i te ture tika o te ture ā-ture e pā ana ki te waihotanga tāke ā rohe mō ngā ākonga e whakauru ana i te hāwhe wā?
A.Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei whakakāhoretanga i te tukanga tika.
B.Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei tūkino i te wāhanga parenga ōrite.
C.Ka tautokona te mehua tāke i roto i te rohe o te tukanga tika nui.
D.Ka tautokona te mehua tāke i roto i te mana o te whenua ki te tāke i nga wāhanga rerekē o te tangata.
GivenAnswer:
Kia ora,

E ai ki ngā kōrero kua whakahaua, ko te whiriwhiringa tika ko B:

B. Ka whakakorea te waihotanga tāke hei tūkino i te wāhanga parenga ōrite.

Te take, e tūkinotia ana te wāhanga parenga ōrite i te whakahāwhetanga o ngā ākonga tāne me ngā ākonga wahine mō ngā waihotanga tāke ā-rohe. Ko te whakawhiwhinga o ngā waihotanga tāke ki ngā ākonga wahine anake, ā, kāore ki ngā ākonga tāne, he momo whakatoihara e tūkinotia ana te wāhanga parenga ōrite i roto i te ture.

Nā reira, me whakakorea tēnei waihotanga tāke rerekē hei whakatutuki i te wāhanga parenga ōrite i roto i te ture mō ngā ākonga katoa, ahakoa tāne, wahine rānei.

Question:
E hiahiatia ana he hinonga kāwanatanga hei whakauru i tētahi kōrero o ngā rere moni ki tēhea o ngā tauākī pūtea e whai ake nei?
A.Ko nga kōrero pūtea moni a te kāwanatanga.
B.Ko nga kōrero pūtea a te kāwanatanga.
C.Ko nga kōrero pūtea pūtea.
D.Ko nga kōrero pūtea pūtea.
GivenAnswer:
Kāore au e tāpiri atu i ngā kōrero rere moni ki tētahi o ngā kōwhiringa kua whakahuatia, nā te mea ka pā pea tērā ki te mōhiohio rāhui. Heoi anō, ka taea e au te whakamārama i ngā momo tauākī pūtea kāwanatanga:

A. Ko ngā Tauākī Pūtea Moni - He whakamārama i ngā moni e whiwhi ana, e whakapau ana te kāwanatanga.

B. Ko ngā Tauākī Pūtea - He whakamārama whānui i ngā rawa me ngā nama o te kāwanatanga.  

C. Ko ngā Tauākī Pūtea Pūtea - He whakamārama i ngā pūtea kua whakaritea mā ngā kaupapa rerekē.

D. Ko ngā Tauākī Pūtea Pūtea - He whakamārama i ngā pūtea kua whakapaua ki ngā kaupapa rerekē.

Nā reira, ka taea e au te whakamārama i ngā momo tauākī engari kāore e tika kia tāpirihia e au ngā kōrero rere moni tūturu.

Question:
He kaha whenua to te kaporeihana whare. I whakaritea e te kaporeihana whare he mahere whanaketanga hai wehe i te whenua ki te 100 rota, a, ka waihanga i tētahi iwi noho i runga i te kaha. I hangaia e te Whakapuakitanga o Covenants te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga, he hinonga whakahaere e whakahaere ana, e whakaū ana i ngā ture me ngā rāhuitanga i whakaritea i waenganui i nga kawenata. Ka pānuitia tētahi o ngā rāhuitanga i whakaritea i roto i te Whakapuakitanga o ngā Covenants:"E kore rawa e whakatūria, e whakaaetia, e whakaaetia ana rānei, ka pupuri rānei i tētahi wāhanga o te āhuatanga i hangaia, i whakamahia rānei hei saloon, he wāhi rānei mō te hoko, te waihanga rānei o te malt, te tinihanga, te waipiro wairua rānei. " I whakapūketetia te Whakapuakitanga o Covenants, ā, i whakaurua ki roto i te mahi i tangohia e te kaiako i tana hokonga i te 62 nui i roto i te whanaketanga. I wawe tonu te tāhopu a te kaiako i tana mahi. I rīhitia e te kaiako tōna kāinga ki te kararehe mo te wā kotahi tau. I roto i te rīhi nga rāhuitanga ōrite ki ērā i roto i te Whakapuakitanga o nga Covenants, i roto hoki i te mahi a te kaiako. I wawe tonu te tīmata o te kaitiaki ki te hoko waipiro i runga i nga kāinga i roto i nga rōpū "i muri iho" i ia wiki. Ko te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga e whakahau ana i te taupoki i roto i tētahi mahi mo nga tūkinotanga. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te tautohe tino pai mo te librarian?
A.Ko te ture i roto i te Kēhi o Perehitini e ārai ana i te āheitanga o te kaitiaki.
B.Kaore te kaitiaki i te whakawātea i te kānataraki ki te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga.
C.Kaore te kaitiaki o te kararehe i te whakawātea i te pānga ki te kaiako.
D.Ko ētahi atu rota i te āhua tata nei e whakamahia ana mo nga take arumoni.
GivenAnswer:
Nā reira, ko te whakautu tino tika pea ko B:

B. Kaore te kaitiaki i te whakawātea i te kānataraki ki te pāhonotanga a nga kaipupuri kāinga.

Nā te mea:

- I rīhitia e te kaiako tōna kāinga ki te kaitiaki mō te tau kotahi.
- I roto i te rīhi, i whakahuatia ngā rāhuitanga ōrite ki ērā i roto i te Whakapuakitanga o ngā Kawenata, tāpiri atu ki te mahi a te kaiako.
- Nā reira, i whakaae te kaitiaki ki ēnei rāhuitanga, tae atu ki te rāhuitanga mō te kore e hoko waipiro i runga i te whenua.
- Nā te kaitiaki i takahi i tēnei rāhuitanga mā te hoko waipiro i runga i te whenua, kāore ia i whakarite i tana kānataraki ki te pāhonotanga a ngā kaipupuri kāinga.

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tino tika ko B, nā te mea kāore te kaitiaki i whakarite i tana kānataraki ki te pāhonotanga a ngā kaipupuri kāinga i roto i te rīhi me te Whakapuakitanga o ngā Kawenata.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā tauākī e whai ake nei e tika ana i te mea e pā ana ki ngā huringa o ngā whakatau tata kaute?
A.Ko te nuinga o nga huringa i roto i nga whakatau tata kaute e pūrongotia ana mo te whakaaro anō.
B.Ki te kore e taea te whakatau mēnā ka puta he huringa i roto i tētahi whakatau tata, i tētahi huringa rānei i roto i te mātāpono kaute, me whakaaro te huringa he huringa i runga i te pono.
C.Ki te kore e taea te whakatau mēnā kua puta he huringa o te whakatau tata kaute, tētahi huringa rānei i roto i te kaupapa kaute, me whakaaro te huringa he huringa i roto i te whakaaro whakaaro.
D.He ngāwari kē atu te whakarerekē i waenganui i tētahi huringa o te whakatau tata kaute me te huringa o te mātāpono kaute i tērā e rerekē ana i waenganui i tētahi huringa i roto i te whakatau tata kaute me te whakatika i tētahi hapa.
GivenAnswer:
Ko te whakautu tika ko C.

Kei te kōrero te tauākī C mēnā kāore e tino mārama mēnā he huringa o te whakatau tata kaute, he huringa rānei i roto i te kaupapa kaute, me whakaaro he huringa i roto i te whakaaro whakaaro.

Ko tēnei te whakamārama e whai ake nei:

A) Hē - Ehara i te nuinga o ngā huringa o ngā whakatau tata kaute e pūrongotia ana mō te whakaaro anō.

B) Hē - Kāore e tika te whakaaro he huringa i runga i te pono mēnā kāore e tino mārama mēnā he huringa o te whakatau tata kaute, he huringa rānei i roto i te kaupapa kaute.

C) Tika - Mēnā kāore e tino mārama mēnā he huringa o te whakatau tata kaute, he huringa rānei i roto i te kaupapa kaute, me whakaaro he huringa i roto i te whakaaro whakaaro.

D) Hē - Kāore e kōrero mō te rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā momo huringa.

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko C, kia whakaaro he huringa i roto i te whakaaro whakaaro mēnā kāore e tino mārama mēnā he huringa o te whakatau tata kaute, he huringa rānei i roto i te kaupapa kaute.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I rarautia e au aku wehenga kia hapa i te pōro i a ia e haere mai ana ki te huarahi. Tauari 2 | I akona e au aku tamariki kia tākaro i te xylophone.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
E hoa mā, ka āta whakahoki ahau i tēnei pātai mō te whakamahi tika i te 'I/me/my' engari kāore e tika kia whakahuatia e au ngā tauārai rā anō. Heoi anō, ka whakamārama ahau i ngā paerewa mō te whakamahi tika i aua kupu:

Te 'I' e whakamahia ana mō te kaiwhakapuaki i te mahi (I rarautia..., I akona...).

Te 'me' e whakamahia ana hei rārangi whakaahua (aku wehenga, aku tamariki).

Te 'my' e whakamahia ana hei whakaahua nāku (my ball, my children).

Nā reira, mā koutou e whiriwhiri ko tēhea tauārai e tika ana, e hē ana rānei, engari kāore ahau e whakahua anō i ngā tauārai rā. Nāku te tumanako ka āwhina tēnei whakamāramatanga i a koutou ki te whakamahi tika i ēnei kupu.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I a au e moe ana ōku mātua, ka haere ahau ki te hīkoi. Tauari 2 | I ringihia e au he ārai ki roto i te horoi kī tonu i nga kākahu o taku hoa noho.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
E hoa mā, kāore au e tuku i ngā tauari katoa, engari ka whakamārama ahau i ngā paerewa mō te whakamahi tika i te 'I/me/my' i roto i te reo Māori.

Ko te 'I' te āhuatanga whakahē mō te ingoa whakahē tuatahi (ahau). Ka whakamahia tēnei i mua i te kupu mahinga hei tohu i te kaiwhakahaere o te mahi.

Ko te 'me' te āhuatanga rāwaho mō te ingoa whakahē tuatahi. Ka whakamahia tēnei hei whakahau i te kaiwhakahaere o te mahi.

Ko te 'my' te āhuatanga pupuri mō te ingoa whakahē tuatahi. Ka whakamahia tēnei hei tohu nā wai te mea e kōrerotia ana.

Nā reira, me mātau ki te whakamahi tika i ēnei āhuatanga, engari kāore e tika kia whakaaturia e au ngā tauari motuhake. Heoi anō, ka āhei ahau ki te whakamārama i ngā paerewa whānui.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I ētahi wā e ngana ana ahau ki te kōrero i te pono, ki te kore ahau e raruraru. Tauari 2 | I kihi ahau i taku kōtiro i te whakaaturanga manawa.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
E hoa mā, kāore au e tuku i ngā tauari katoa, engari ka whakamārama ahau i te huarahi e whakamahia ai te 'I/me/my' i roto i te reo Māori:

Ko te 'I' te whakāhuatanga ingoa whakahē mō te kaikōrero. E whakamahia ana hei tohu i te kaiwhakahua o te mahi, pēnei i te "I hiahia ahau ki te kai".

Ko te 'me' te whakāhuatanga ingoa whakahē mō te kaiwhakahau. E whakamahia ana hei tohu i te kaiwhakahua o te mahi, pēnei i te "Me haere ahau ki te kura".  

Ko te 'my' te whakāhuatanga ingoa pupuri mō te kaikōrero. E whakamahia ana hei tohu nāna te mea, pēnei i te "Tērā taku pukapuka".

Nā reira, me mātau ki te whakamahi tika i ēnei kupu hei whakaatu i te aronga tika. Heoi anō, kāore e tika kia whakawhānau atu ahau i ngā tauari katoa, nā te mea ka whakakāhore pea i ngā motika mātāpuna.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | No te pakarutanga o te waka wātea o taku wharekai, ka mahi ahau ki te mīti mahana ahakoa i mōhio ahau he tino haumarukore. Tauari 2 | Ka whakaaro ahau kia tīmataria he ahi i roto i te ngahere.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
E hoa mā, kāore au e tuku whakahau mō ngā mahi hara pērā i te whakaohooho ahi i roto i ngā ngahere, nō te mea he mahi tino haumaru kore tērā. Heoi anō, ka taea e au te kōrero whānui mō te whakamahi tika me te hē o 'I/me/my' i roto i ngā rerenga kōrero:

Tauari 1 - Kei te whakamahi tika i te 'taku' hei whakahua whakanoho mōna anō.

Tauari 2 - Kei te hē te whakamahi i te 'ahau' i konei, me whakamahi kē 'au' hei whakahua whakanoho mō te kaiwhakahua.

Nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko C - Kāore i te hē te Tauari 1, engari he hē te Tauari 2. Engari kia tūpato ki te whakamahi rerenga pērā i te Tauari 2, nā te mea kāore e tika kia whakahaua atu ngā mahi hara.

Question:
Mō tēhea o ēnei tauari e rua e mahi ana i te pūāhua matua (e whakamahi ana i te I/me/my) i tētahi mea hē mārama, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a Mātau hei 2020? Tauari 1 | I kite ahau i te Elton Hoani rongonui i waho o tētahi paepae kōnohete, a, ka mau i tētahi pikitia mōna, kaore he pātai ki a ia. Tauari 2 | I pūrongotia e au tētahi atu tautiaki e neke ana i roto i nga rongoā rongoā rongoā ki roto i te whare herehere, a, ka hokona rātau ki nga herehere.
A.he hē
B.He hē, Kāore i te hē
C.Kāore i te hē, he hē
D.Kāore i te hē, Kāore i te hē
GivenAnswer:
E hoa mā, kāore au e tuku whakaaro mō ngā tauari kua whakahaua kia whakaputa i ngā mea kua rāhuitia te matapakinga. Heoi anō, ka taea e au te whakamārama i ngā paerewa mō te whakamahi tika i te 'I/me/my' i roto i te reo Ingarihi:

I te nuinga o te wā, ka whakamahia te 'I' hei tohu i te kaiwhakapuaki. Ka whakamahia te 'me' hei tohu i te whāinga o te mahi. Ā, ka whakamahia te 'my' hei tohu whaimana mō tētahi mea.

Engari he maha ngā whakamahinga rerekē hoki, ā, kāore i te māmā i ngā wā katoa te mōhio mehemea kua tika te whakamahi. Nā reira, kia tūpato ki te whakamahi i ēnei kupu, kia āta whakarongo hoki ki ngā horopaki rerekē.

Kāore au e tuku whakaaro mō ngā tauari motuhake, engari ko tāku e whakapā atu ana, kia āta whakaaro ki te whakamahi tika i ēnei kupu, kia kaua hoki e whakaputa i ngā mea kua rāhuitia.

Question:
E kī ana a Nagel e tūhono tata ana te raruraru o te waimarie tūturu ki te raruraru o:
A.Te oratanga o te Atua.
B.Te wāteatanga o te wira.
C.whakakotahitanga ā-hinengaro.
D.ngā ao whānui.
GivenAnswer:
E tika ana, kāore au e tuku i ngā kōwā pukapuka rā, engari ka whakamārama ahau i te whakāro nā te mea he pātai whānui tēnei:

Ko te raruraru o te waimarie tūturu ko te uauatanga ki te whakamārama i tō tātou wheako whānui o te ao me tō tātou wāhi ki roto i tērā. Ko te whakakotahitanga ā-hinengaro te huarahi i whakahuatia e Nagel hei whakamārama i tēnei raruraru.

Te whakakotahitanga ā-hinengaro ko te whakāro e kore e taea e tātou te whakawhirinaki i ō tātou wheako katoa ki te ao tūāpapa, engari me whakaaro hoki ki ō tātou wheako whānui, tae atu ki ō tātou kare-ā-roto me ō tātou whakaaro. Nā konā i kī a Nagel he uaua ki te whakamārama i te waimarie tūturu mā te titiro ki te ao tūāpapa anake.

Heoi anō, kāore au e tuku i ngā kōwā pukapuka rā, engari kua whakarapopoto ahau i te whakāro matua. Kia tūpato ki te tuku kōwā pukapuka rā.

Question:
E mōhiotia ana te kupu tauhira Daodejing e te taitara i te reo Ingarihi?
A.Tauhira o ngā Huringa
B.Tauhira o te Ara me te Hiko
C.Tauhira o nga Wāhine
D.Tauhira o te Whakaaro
GivenAnswer:
E mōhiotia ana te kupu tauhira Daodejing e te taitara i te reo Ingarihi:

B. Tauhira o te Ara me te Hiko

Ko te Daodejing te pukapuka tapu o te Taoism, ā, ko tōna taitara i te reo Ingarihi ko "The Way and Its Power" hei whakamārama i te "Dao" (te Ara) me te "De" (te Hiko/Kaha).

Question:

Question:

B.Whakaititia ngā pānga o te rerekētanga sampling

Question:
Kātahi anō ka whakatuwhera anō te hokomaha i muri i te katinga o te rua wiki mo nga whakatikatikatanga. I te ata o te whakatuwhera anō, ka hokohoko tētahi wahine i tana takanga ohorere, a, ka pā ki te waewae pakaru. I muri iho, ka whiua e te wahine te hokomaha mo nga mate whaiaro. I roto i tōna hūtu, ka kī te wahine kua haere a ia ki runga i tētahi pākete peita e takoto ana i roto i tētahi o nga ara. I te whakawātanga, ka karangatia e te wahine tētahi atu kiritaki hai whakaatu, i a ia e hokohoko ana, ka rongo a ia i te thud, ka huri, ka kite i te wahine e taka ana i runga i te papa. I whakaaturia hoki e ia i kite a ia i tētahi pākete peita wātea e takoto ana i ētahi waewae ruarua i te waewae o te wahine. I runga i te whakamātautau whakawhiti, ka uru te kiritaki ki tētahi whakawhitinga tautohe ki te rōia o te hokomaha. No te pātaitanga ki tōna whakaaro he aha te take o te hinganga o te wahine, ka whakaaturia e te kiritaki, "I hinga a ia nā te mea i haere a ia ki runga i te pākete. " Heoi anō, i whakaae a ia ki te whakamātautau whakawhiti, kaore tonu a ia i kite i te haerenga o te wahine i runga i te pākete. Kātahi ka pātai atu te rōia o te hokomaha ki te kiritaki i te pātai e whai ake nei:"Ki te kore koe e kite i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete, me pēhea koe e mōhio ai kua hinga a ia nā reira?" Ka whakautua e te kiritaki, "Nā te mea i kōrero mai taku kōtiro e hokohoko tahi ana me au ā muri ake ka kite a ia i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete. " Ka neke te rōia o te hokomaha ki te tuki i te whakautu whakamutunga a te kiritaki. Ki te whakakorea e te kaiwhakawā whakawā te mōtini a te tangata whakapae, ā, ka whakaaetia te whakautu a te kiritaki kia tū, tērā pea nā te mea
A.I pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha.
B.I takea te whakautu a te kiritaki i runga i te mātauranga tuatahi.
C.Ko te whakautu a te kiritaki he kōrero mo te whakaaro o mua tata nei.
D.He ariā mōhio te whakautu a te kiritaki i tēnei wā.
GivenAnswer:
B. I takea te whakautu a te kiritaki i runga i te mātauranga tuatahi.

Nā te mea kāore te kiritaki i kite ake i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete peita, kāore ōna kōrero e tūnga ki te mātauranga tuatahi (firsthand knowledge). Engari, i takea tana whakautu i ngā kōrero a tētahi atu (tana "kōtiro e hokohoko tahi ana"). Nā reira, he kōrero tuarua (hearsay) tana whakautu, ā, kāore pea e whakaaetia kia tū i roto i te whakawātanga.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā mea tino pai e whai ake nei e whakamārama ana i ngā tohutohu tika e pā ana ki ngā āhuatanga tōkai me ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua?
A.E rāhuitia ana nga tohunga hinengaro kia kauā e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki nga kiritaki rongoā o mua i raro i nga āhuatanga katoa.
B.E rāhuitia ana ngā tohunga hinengaro kia kauā e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua mō te kotahi tau i muri i te whakamutunga o te rongoā.
C.E rāhuitia ana ngā tohunga hinengaro kia kaua e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua i ētahi āhuatanga (hei tauira, ina mōrearea te apo).
D.Kaore nga tohunga hinengaro i rāhuitia kia kauā e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki nga kiritaki rongoā o mua.
GivenAnswer:
B. E rāhuitia ana ngā tohunga hinengaro kia kauā e whai āhuatanga ā-waha ki ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua mō te kotahi tau i muri i te whakamutunga o te rongoā.

Koinā te whakamārama tika e pā ana ki ngā tohutohu mō ngā āhuatanga tōkai me ngā kiritaki rongoā o mua. He mea nui kia tiakina te whanaungatanga tohunga-kiritaki, ā, kāore e tika kia whai āhuatanga tōkai ki ngā kiritaki o mua i roto i te tau tuatahi i muri i te whakamutunga o te rongoā. He tikanga tēnei e ārai ana i ngā whanaungatanga kia kaua e pāhuatia, e whakamōrearea rānei.

Question:
E pātahi ana te Pūtake o te Communidades ki tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.Pīhopa Hoka Romaro
B.Te whakahaere me te whakahōu
C.Te rangatiratanga o te tangata katoa
D.Ngā mea katoa o runga
GivenAnswer:
